title: 1Br**No Lease**Pets OK**Parking**Corso Italia (SC)
description:
Busy? Working professional? Student? New to Toronto? Need to get out of that AirBnB??? Then this is the perfect space for you!


All-inclusive, luxury rental available in the heart of Corso Italia. All you need to do is relax, unpack your suitcase and move on with your busy life :)


Available: April 1, 2019


Location: St. Clair St & Dufferin Ave, Toronto

Rent: $2150-2450/mo

Lease: 3 month minimum. Then month-to-month.

Bed: 1 Spacious Bedroom. Brand new pillow-top mattress & pillows.

Bath: 1 Full, shared, newly renovated

House Size: 400 sf renovated apartment

Utilities: Included

Internet: Included. High-speed Internet (Unlimited Data) + Cable

Furniture: Included. Brand new luxury furnishings

Appliances: Fridge, stove/oven, microwave

Laundry: In-building

Parking: Secure garage parking available for $50/mo

Backyard: Private 2,000 sqft yard with outdoor furniture

Storage: Large secure outdoor storage locker (bikes etc.)

Pets: Yes, with references (one time $200 pet cleaning fee)

Smoking: No smoking or vaping inside. In designated area's only.


I am pleased to offer a beautifully renovated apartment for rent. This bright, basement apartment features 8ft ceilings and a brand new kitchen and bath. This suite has been appointed with high-end furniture designed to maximize the use of space.


We also have a beautiful back yard pergola equipped with luxury outdoor furniture, perfect for relaxing after work alone or with guests. The basement also has plenty of storage available for bikes, kayaks, Christmas trees and other life items.


This would be a perfect space for a young professional or couple.


Rent includes ALL utilities & premium high-speed internet/cable package (unlimited data).


The location is unbeatable with the TTC Streetcar, Davenport thoroughfare at your doorstep, Joseph J. Piccininni Community Centre (rink pool courts, Earslcourt Park, Public Library at your doorstep. Downtown is only 15 min away to CN Tower, University of Toronto, Ryerson, BMO Centre, Entertainment District, Fashion District, High Park and more.


Corso Italia is a traditionally Italian and Portuguese neighbourhood known for great food and a family oriented atmosphere. But a new wave of residents from all over the world is revitalizing this area with great activities including the annual Latin Fest, as well as fabulous Brazilian, El Salvadorian and Ethiopian restaurants just to name a few.


If this sounds interesting to you please text/call me at 647-619-5283


Thank you!


**Note: Multiple rooms available, furniture may vary from photos


Keywords

Executive housing, furnished rental, AirBnB, family friendly, Bloordale Village, Bloor West Village, Little Italy, Brockton Village, Davenport, Junction, High Park, Stockyards District, Little Malta, Roncesvalles, Baby Point, Lambton, Annex, Trinity Bellwoods, Little Portugal, Liberty Village, King West Village, Yorkville, Yorkdale, Yonge Street, Cabbagetown, Leslieville, Riverside, Greektown, Danforth Village, The Beaches, College St, Dufferin, University of Toronto, Ryerson University, George Brown College‎, OCAD University‎, Tyndale University College and Seminary‎, York University, Humber College‎, Centennial College‎, student housing, Randolph Academy for the Performing Arts

I am pleased to offer a beautifully renovated apartment for rent. This bright, basement apartment features 8ft ceilings and a brand new kitchen and bath. This suite has been appointed with high-end furniture designed to maximize the use of space.


We also have a beautiful back yard pergola equipped with luxury outdoor furniture, perfect for relaxing after work alone or with guests. The basement also has plenty of storage available for bikes, kayaks, Christmas trees and other life items.

Corso Italia is a traditionally Italian and Portuguese neighbourhood known for great food and a family oriented atmosphere.
